author: kylebjordahl
post_text: June 1, 2014 at 1:42 AM#1I've got a pair of sequences that need to change which cue they loop on based on value of a variable, which is set in the cmd of a third sequence. Currently it looks like:Codesetvar $loop = 7That third cue list is going to be long, so I'm automating the build with a macro, but can't come up with a way to create the cmd value of the cue from within another macro. Ideally, I would also be able to change the value of a given cue's loop with another macro, something like:Codesetvar $thisloop = ("Where to loop?")setvar $cue = ("Cue?")Assign Sequence 3 Cue $cue /Cmd="setvar $loop = "$thisloop
title: Macro to use Cue CMD to setvar
